datoCmsKey.name: Sarah Hogewood
datoCmsKey.locations: New York City| Raleigh| Washington DC| New York
datoCmsKey.bio: Originally from Raleigh NC, I am a graduate of NYU Tisch School of the Arts' Musical Theatre program and a member of AEA.  Queeros include: Lily Tomlin, Alice Walker, Pauli Murray, Michael McElroy, and Ms. Frizzle.  Strong suits: development of new work, devised theatre, Shakespeare, ballet training, and most of all a voice that likes to sing all kinds of music! (I am a high lyric soprano w/ high mix, chest belt, and very low extension into the "male" range.) Always looking for new collaborators!
